abstracts.cdata!:
Project ratings are as follows: Project
            outcome is satisfactory; sustainability is likely;
            institutional development impact is substantial; Bank
            performance is satisfactory; and Borrower performance is
            satisfactory.  1) Strong leadership in the Government and
            the World Bank is key to rapid preparation and resolution of
            issues in client countries like South Africa. 2) Stocktaking
            of procedures and practices of both Government and Bank may
            pay-off during implementation, especially in new client
            relationship. 3) Open and regular dialogue, especially in
            challenging situations, resulted in a fully satisfactory
            outcome. 4) Implementation support missions should be
            discussed with the Government well in advance. 5) The
            definition of a general framework of capacity building could
            be built in at the design of such type of projects, as well
            as procedures to react flexibly to arising needs. 6) In this
            operation clear targets and periodic feedback to
            implementing agencies or contractors could have helped
            prevent that transfer. 7) Flexibility in procurement
            arrangements in a future activity would make them fit better
            with the larger country context. With 8) In an operation
            with this set of objectives to reach small micro- and
            medium-sized enterprises and previously disadvantaged
            individuals, it is essential that attention is to be
            maintained on that goal. 9) Standardization of processes
            facilitates information and knowledge management for Program
            Managers and Senior Managers. 10) Impact studies show that
            in retrospect the project could have given out a lower level
            of subsidies. The lesson can be drawn that where Government
            transfers are used as support mechanism, an impact review
            upstream including a control group would help to make
            adjustments at mid-term review.
